summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing preparation of plans, specifications, cost estimates, the hiring of consultants in connection therewith, and the construction of street improvements in the Madrona Neighborhood by installing high intensity luminaires along 34th Avenue East from East Spring Street to East Pike Street and along East Union Street from 33rd Avenue East to 34th Avenue East and making an appropriation from the Neighborhood Improvement Fund therefor.
